channel.title: [508]Creating NPCs on a bulby base[508]
channel.description:
Well I could not find a single tutorial on this. Im not sure if this works with other server bases but i know it does on bulby.
Go into bin/data/nps/npcspawn.cfg
Example [code]spawn = 494 3164 3488 0 0 0 0 0 Banker[/code]
the first four are Id coordx coordy hieght You can change banker to whatever you want. Just paste that anywhere in npcspawn.cfg and edit it.

item.title: [508]Creating NPCs on a bulby base[508]
item.dc:creator: @x3ndless x3ndless
item.description:
@x3ndless wrote:

Well I could not find a single tutorial on this.
Im not sure if this works with other server bases but i know it does on bulby.

Go into bin/data/nps/npcspawn.cfg

Example

spawn = 494 3164 3488 0 0 0 0 0 Banker

the first four are Id coordx coordy hieght
You can change banker to whatever you want.
Just paste that anywhere in npcspawn.cfg and edit it.

Read full topic
